name: The-Amazing-Little-Poll
author: Brendan Coles <bcoles@gmail.com>, Andrew Horton
description: The Amazing Little Poll is a very simple php polling script.

matches.regexp: (?-mix:<h1>The Amazing Little Poll Admin Center v([^<]+)<\/h1>)

matches.text: Admin Password:

matches.regexp: (?-mix:\/\/ Change this password so no one else can access the lp_admin\.php via the web\s+\$pwd="([^"]+)";)
